$comment: A message sent by the server to the other server when it connects to it. It informs the other server about its public key and endpoints and (optionally) its peers

server_address.description: Canonical address of the server with a protocol prefix and the port number for connecting as a server

client_address.description: Canonical address of the server with a protocol prefix and the port number for connecting as a client

peers.description: A list of peers the server is connected to (excluding itself). These can be other organizers or witnesses

address.description: Canonical address of the server with a protocol prefix and the port number
